**ë¼ì´íŠ¸ ëª¨ë“œ (ê¸°ë³¸):**
- ë°°ê²½: í°ìƒ‰
- í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸: ê²€ì€ìƒ‰

**ë‹¤í¬ ëª¨ë“œ:**
- ë°°ê²½: ê²€ì€ìƒ‰
- í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸: í°ìƒ‰
- Primary ë²„íŠ¼: í°ìƒ‰

```diff
+                 {servers.filter((s) =&gt; s.status === &quot;active&quot;).length}
+               &lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;/CardContent&gt;
+           &lt;/Card&gt;
+           &lt;Card&gt;
+             &lt;CardHeader className=&quot;flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2&quot;&gt;
+               &lt;CardTitle className=&quot;text-sm font-medium&quot;&gt;ë¹„í™œì„± ì„œë²„&lt;/CardTitle&gt;
+               &lt;Square className=&quot;h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground&quot; /&gt;
+             &lt;/CardHeader&gt;
+             &lt;CardContent&gt;
+               &lt;div className=&quot;text-2xl font-bold&quot;&gt;
+                 {servers.filter((s) =&gt; s.status === &quot;inactive&quot;).length}
+               &lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;/CardContent&gt;
+           &lt;/Card&gt;
+           &lt;Card&gt;
+             &lt;CardHeader className=&quot;flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2&quot;&gt;
+               &lt;CardTitle className=&quot;text-sm font-medium&quot;&gt;ì˜¤ë¥˜ ì„œë²„&lt;/CardTitle&gt;
+               &lt;Activity className=&quot;h-4 w-4 text-red-500&quot; /&gt;
+             &lt;/CardHeader&gt;
+             &lt;CardContent&gt;
+               &lt;div className=&quot;text-2xl font-bold&quot;&gt;
+                 {servers.filter((s) =&gt; s.status === &quot;error&quot;).length}
+               &lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;/CardContent&gt;
+           &lt;/Card&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+         {/* Servers Table */}
+         &lt;Card&gt;
+           &lt;CardHeader&gt;
+             &lt;CardTitle&gt;ì„œë²„ ëª©ë¡&lt;/CardTitle&gt;
+             &lt;CardDescription&gt;
+               ë“±ë¡ëœ MCP ì„œë²„ ëª©ë¡ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì„œë²„ë¥¼ í´ë¦­í•˜ì—¬ ìƒì„¸ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ í™•ì¸í•˜ê±°ë‚˜
+               ìˆ˜ì •í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.
+             &lt;/CardDescription&gt;
+           &lt;/CardHeader&gt;
+           &lt;CardContent&gt;
+             &lt;Table&gt;
+               &lt;TableHeader&gt;
+                 &lt;TableRow&gt;
+                   &lt;TableHead&gt;ì´ë¦„&lt;/TableHead&gt;
+                   &lt;TableHead&gt;ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸&lt;/TableHead&gt;
+                   &lt;TableHead&gt;ìƒíƒœ&lt;/TableHead&gt;
+                   &lt;TableHead&gt;ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ ì²´í¬&lt;/TableHead&gt;
+                   &lt;TableHead className=&quot;text-right&quot;&gt;ì‘ì—…&lt;/TableHead&gt;
+                 &lt;/TableRow&gt;
+               &lt;/TableHeader&gt;
+               &lt;TableBody&gt;
+                 {servers.length === 0 ? (
+                   &lt;TableRow&gt;
+                     &lt;TableCell colSpan={5} className=&quot;text-center py-8&quot;&gt;
+                       ë“±ë¡ëœ ì„œë²„ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤
+                     &lt;/TableCell&gt;
+                   &lt;/TableRow&gt;
+                 ) : (
+                   servers.map((server) =&gt; (
+                     &lt;TableRow key={server.id}&gt;
+                       &lt;TableCell&gt;
+                         &lt;div&gt;
+                           &lt;div className=&quot;font-medium&quot;&gt;{server.name}&lt;/div&gt;
+                           {server.description &amp;&amp; (
+                             &lt;div className=&quot;text-sm text-muted-foreground&quot;&gt;
+                               {server.description}
+                             &lt;/div&gt;
+                           )}
+                         &lt;/div&gt;
+                       &lt;/TableCell&gt;
+                       &lt;TableCell&gt;
+                         &lt;code className=&quot;text-xs bg-muted px-2 py-1 rounded&quot;&gt;
+                           {server.endpoint}
+                         &lt;/code&gt;
+                       &lt;/TableCell&gt;
+                       &lt;TableCell&gt;{getStatusBadge(server.status)}&lt;/TableCell&gt;
+                       &lt;TableCell&gt;
+                         {server.last_health_check
+                           ? new Date(server.last_health_check).toLocaleString()
+                           : &quot;-&quot;}
+                       &lt;/TableCell&gt;
+                       &lt;TableCell className=&quot;text-right&quot;&gt;
+                         &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center justify-end gap-2&quot;&gt;
+                           &lt;Button
+                             variant=&quot;ghost&quot;
+                             size=&quot;icon&quot;
+                             onClick={() =&gt; handleHealthCheck(server.id)}
+                             title=&quot;ê±´ê°• ì²´í¬&quot;
+                           &gt;
+                             &lt;RefreshCw className=&quot;h-4 w-4&quot; /&gt;
+                           &lt;/Button&gt;
+                           {server.status === &quot;active&quot; ? (
+                             &lt;Button
+                               variant=&quot;ghost&quot;
+                               size=&quot;icon&quot;
+                               onClick={() =&gt;
+                                 handleStatusChange(server.id, &quot;inactive&quot;)
+                               }
+                               title=&quot;ë¹„í™œì„±í™”&quot;
+                             &gt;
+                               &lt;Square className=&quot;h-4 w-4&quot; /&gt;
+                             &lt;/Button&gt;
+                           ) : (
+                             &lt;Button
+                               variant=&quot;ghost&quot;
+                               size=&quot;icon&quot;
+                               onClick={() =&gt;
+                                 handleStatusChange(server.id, &quot;active&quot;)
+                               }
+                               title=&quot;í™œì„±í™”&quot;
+                             &gt;
+                               &lt;Play className=&quot;h-4 w-4&quot; /&gt;
+                             &lt;/Button&gt;
+                           )}
+                           &lt;Button
+                             variant=&quot;ghost&quot;
+                             size=&quot;icon&quot;
+                             onClick={() =&gt; handleOpenDialog(server)}
+                             title=&quot;ìˆ˜ì •&quot;
+                           &gt;
+                             &lt;Edit className=&quot;h-4 w-4&quot; /&gt;
+                           &lt;/Button&gt;
+                           &lt;Button
+                             variant=&quot;ghost&quot;
+                             size=&quot;icon&quot;
+                             onClick={() =&gt; handleDelete(server.id)}
+                             title=&quot;ì‚­ì œ&quot;
+                           &gt;
+                             &lt;Trash2 className=&quot;h-4 w-4 text-destructive&quot; /&gt;
+                           &lt;/Button&gt;
+                         &lt;/div&gt;
+                       &lt;/TableCell&gt;
+                     &lt;/TableRow&gt;
+                   ))
+                 )}
+               &lt;/TableBody&gt;
+             &lt;/Table&gt;
+           &lt;/CardContent&gt;
+         &lt;/Card&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   );
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>
